mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_ID, OPERATION_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, TUTORING_NUMBER, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_TIME, (SELECT NAME FROM PLAY WHERE PLAY.PLAY_ID = SCHEDULE.PLAY_ID) PLAY_NAME REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE, UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') UPD_DATE FROM SCHEDULE LIMIT #{startPage}, #{recordsPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( OPERATION_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, TUTORING_NUMBER, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_TIME, PLAY_ID, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{operationType}, #{numberOfPeople}, #{tutoringNumber}, #{scheduleDate}, #{scheduleTime}, #{playId}, #{regId}, NOW() )
